app.title: Bilibili Downloader

video.title_placeholder: The title will be auto-filled after entering a URL
video.title_description: Enter the BiliBili video title. It will be used as the file name.
video.quality_description: Select the quality of the video to download.
video.quality_note: * Some high qualities like 720p60 / 1080p60 may not be selectable depending on login state or region.
